comment: Great teacher! Does not take attendance but if you don't go to class you don't get the notes needed for the tests. Gives outlines for notes which helps studying for tests. Six writing assignments that take some time but she only takes the 4 highest grades so I only did 4. Pay attention and study and you will make an A!

AMAZING Professor!  She is easy to follow and take notes from and though you will need to study hard for her tests, the test material is EXACTLY what she teaches and what you write down so studying is easy and productive.  She is also very responsive, nice and obviously knows what she's talking about.  I wish she taught all of my courses!!

This is a tricky course to take because she switches the format of her classes by semester, but she is AWESOME! As long as you pay attention in class, take good notes and STUDY there is no reason you should not pass with flying colors. I have never done good in a history class but I did great in this class - that's saying something.

Super cool, young professor. No homework or quizzes.There are a few one-page essays, but two with lowest grades are dropped. Tests are easy if you study, focuses more on people & concepts, rather than dates. Posts an outline for note taking before every class. Very helpful & understanding. Almost always ends early! Definitely recommend!
ALL ESSAY EXAMS INCLUDING THE CUMULATIVE FINAL. HATE ESSAY TESTS SO I DID NOT ENJOY THIS CLASS.

I hate history,but Lauren actually made it interesting.   Class is not mandatory, but she tests from the notes (there is no textbook).  The quizzes are challenging even you read the essays, but she drops the 3 lowest grades. I would def take her again!

She is a great teacher. As long as you read for the quizzes, you will ace them. As far as tests go, all of our tests were essay style and as long as you go to class,take word for word notes, put a star by the things she repeats, and study, you will receive an easy A.
Even though the quizzes are online they are impossible

Excellent teacher. She stress's and repeats the things in her lecture thats gonna be on her test. Study guide matches test word for word. At lastly she goes out of her way to help you. . . Easy on the eyes as well.

I absolutely can not stand history, and where this wasn't necessarily the most interesting class, she made it easy to pass and was very clear on exactly what was going to be on every test... HIGHLY RECOMMEND especially if history is not really your thing!

Very easy class. Gives outlines and lectures on the outline. Some homework, but it is easy. She gives a midterm and a final, very easy if you study the study guide. Class is optional, but she gives grades for class work, so you should go. Easy A if you put forth the effort.
Very easy tests. Didn't go to class. Homework is easy.
She said that the class would be interesting & it turned out to be really boring. I love history but she just goes on and on. Homework is papers. One due almost every week. Final was an easy A.
Tests are easy.. class is extremely boring ... easy A
